Test include directive with list description that contains open block.

>>> list_description

include::testdata/_includes/list_desc_00.adoc[]

include::testdata/_includes/list_desc_01.adoc[]

<<< list_description

<div class="dlist">
<dl>
<dt class="hdlist1">Item 00</dt>
<dd>
<div class="openblock">
<div class="content">
<div class="ulist">
<ul>
<li>
<p>Bullet 0</p>
<div class="paragraph">
<p>Description 0.</p>
</div>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bullet 1</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</dd>
<dt class="hdlist1">Item 01</dt>
<dd>
<div class="openblock">
<div class="content">
<div class="ulist">
<ul>
<li>
<p>Bullet 0</p>
<div class="paragraph">
<p>Description 0.</p>
</div>
</li>
<li>
<p>Bullet 1</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</dd>
</dl>
</div>
